statements: SELECT * FROM biofuel_production;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption FROM biofuel_production WHERE id = 1;
SELECT process_name, waste_production FROM biofuel_production ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT id, process_name, energy_consumption, waste_production FROM biofuel_production WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM biofuel_production WHERE energy_consumption < 50 OR waste_production > 20;
SELECT * FROM biofuel_production WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY waste_production DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_processes FROM biofuel_production;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption FROM biofuel_production WHERE waste_production < 50 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS average_energy_consumption, AVG(waste_production) AS average_waste_production FROM biofuel_production;
SELECT id, process_name FROM biofuel_production WHERE waste_production BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, process_id, consumption, date FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT process_id, AVG(consumption) AS average_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY process_id;
SELECT date, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteProduction GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption >= 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT process_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY process_id ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT date, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteProduction WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT process_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM WasteProduction WHERE date >= '2021-06-01' GROUP BY process_id HAVING AVG(quantity) > 50
SELECT * FROM biofuel_process;
SELECT process_name, waste_production FROM biofuel_process ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_analysis WHERE analysis_result='positive';
SELECT team_name, researcher_name, email_address FROM research_team;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM sustainability_analysis WHERE process_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption FROM biofuel_process WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT team_name, researcher_name, email_address FROM research_team WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' OR researcher_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY team_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_analysis FROM sustainability_analysis;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption, waste_production FROM biofuel_process WHERE energy_consumption < 50 AND waste_production < 20 ORDER BY process_name DESC, energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_consumed, energy_unit FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_unit = 'kWh';
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_consumed, energy_unit FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT analysis_id, sustainability_score, analysis_date FROM SustainabilityAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_consumed, energy_unit FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_unit = 'kWh';
SELECT ep.*, ba.analysis_date FROM EnergyConsumption ep JOIN SustainabilityAnalysis ba ON ep.production_id = ba.production_id;
SELECT bp.*, sp.* FROM BiofuelProduction bp, SustainabilityAnalysis sp WHERE bp.production_id = sp.production_id;

SELECT ep.production_id, ep.energy_source, sp.sustainability_score FROM EnergyConsumption ep, SustainabilityAnalysis sp WHERE ep.production_id = sp.production_id ORDER BY sp.sustainability_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT process_name, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type = 'electricity';
SELECT production_date, biofuel_type FROM biofuel_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT process_name, location FROM process_locations WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, score, analysis_result FROM sustainability_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT process_name, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY process_name ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT process_name, energy_type, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type='Electricity' ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT biofuel_type, production_date FROM biofuel_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT process_name, location, production_capacity FROM process_locations WHERE production_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
